meanings.definition: The study of the microscopic structure of tissues.
meanings.sent1: Histology helps scientists understand how tiny parts of the body work together.
meanings.sent2: In histology class, students use microscopes to examine tissue samples.
meanings.sent3: The histology professor joked that tissues under the microscope have their own little worlds.
meanings.sent4: Exploring histology is like uncovering hidden secrets in a miniature universe.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of histology lies in revealing the intricate details of tissues.

meanings.definition: The branch of anatomy that deals with the minute structure of animal and plant tissues.
meanings.sent1: Veterinarians rely on histology to analyze animal tissue samples for diseases.
meanings.sent2: Botanists use histology to study the cellular composition of plant tissues.
meanings.sent3: During the histology conference, experts debated the tiniest details of tissue structures.
meanings.sent4: Histology is like a magnifying glass that unveils the hidden world within tissues.
meanings.sent5: The precision of histology reveals the intricate beauty of animal and plant tissues.
